last100days 0.1
  • Reference

Precipitation anomaly in the last 100 days for a given weather station

prec_anomaly.Rd

Find exact station names with rdwd::findID("Berlin", exactmatch=FALSE).

prec_anomaly(station, days = 100, quiet = TRUE)

Arguments

station

Station name from DWD (German Weather Service)
days

How many days (backwards from today) should be considered? Default = 100 days. Values smaller than 14 days not recommended.
quiet

If TRUE (default) messages from rdwd are suppressed.

Value

A table. tbc.

References

See detailed station list from DWD here

Examples

prec_anomaly("Freiburg", days = 365)
